beer.beer_description:
Hops: Enigma
Appearance: red hue
Aroma: pleasant sweet marmalade with redcurrent & cantaloupe
Flavour: sweet citrus orange with an approachable but rich malt cushion
Mouthfeel: medium bitterness

items.badge_description: It’s been a long week and you deserve a drink, or five. Besides, isn’t that what your check is for?

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 160 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 33! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 130 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 27! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
